channel.title: Idk if I have a virus or not
channel.description:
My brother downloaded some stupid bot because he's not the sharpest knife in the kitchen. Anyways he says he used Malewaryebytes to Virus check it... And he said no viruses were found.. Lets say it was a virus, where would I check to confirm if it is or is not a virus..
Thanks
(I'm back to the RuneScape community aswell)

item.title: Idk if I have a virus or not
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:3, topic:470218”]Scan with what?[/quote]Malwarebytes, instead of scanning just the files you think are malicious. If you have deleted the bot and scanned your computer which brings no viruses, then you’re fine (or terribly forked ;))

Read full topic
item.source: Idk if I have a virus or not

item.title: Idk if I have a virus or not

item.source: Idk if I have a virus or not

item.title: Idk if I have a virus or not
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

scan your computer, the files can have malicious content within the code that MWB can often miss

Read full topic
